FuncDef:
The nat-instance command binds a NAT instance to an RBS.
The undo nat-instance command deletes the binding between a NAT instance and an RBS.
By default,no binds a NAT instance to an RBS.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies a NAT instance name.
The value is a string of 1 to 31 case-sensitive characters, spaces not supported.

ExtraInfo: To bind a NAT instance to an RBS, run the nat-instance command. If a configuration is changed or a master/slave main control board switchover is performed because of a fault, the device notifies the NAT instance bound to the RBS to change the configurations and control routes.
